channel.title: Lost Items On Death [Need Help]
channel.description: I want to make it so when you die normally you wont lose items, but when you die in PVP areas you will lose items. Right now my server is set so no matter what if you die in normal area you will lose all but 3 best items. I want to make it so you keep all of them.

item.title: Lost Items On Death [Need Help]
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

I want to make it so when you die normally you wont lose items, but when you die in PVP areas you will lose items. Right now my server is set so no matter what if you die in normal area you will lose all but 3 best items. I want to make it so you keep all of them.

Read full topic
